todoist.models¶

class todoist.models.Model(data, api)[source]¶

Bases: object

Implements a generic object.

class todoist.models.Filter(data, api)[source]¶

Bases: todoist.models.Model

Implements a filter.

update(**kwargs)[source]¶

Updates filter, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

delete()[source]¶

Deletes filter, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

class todoist.models.Item(data, api)[source]¶

Bases: todoist.models.Model

Implements an item.

update(**kwargs)[source]¶

Updates item, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

delete()[source]¶

Deletes item, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

move(to_project)[source]¶

Moves item to another project, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

close()[source]¶

Marks item as closed

complete(force_history=0)[source]¶

Marks item as completed, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

uncomplete(update_item_orders=1, restore_state=None)[source]¶

Marks item as not completed, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

update_date_complete(new_date_utc=None, date_string=None, is_forward=None)[source]¶

Completes a recurring task, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.
